name: 2021 10th International Conference on Mechatronics and Control Engineering
content: Conference Proceedingsï¼š Submitted papers will go through a rigorous full peer review process. And the accepted papers (registered and presented) of ICMCE 2021 will be included into ICMCE 2021 conference proceedings, which will be published in Lecture Notes in Mechanical Engineering. Springer LNEE volumes are indexed by SCOPUS. All books published in the series are submitted for consideration in Web of Science.
